name: The Departure (itch)
description:
This game was made in roughly 3 weeks along with the GameDev unlocked challenge of creating a narrative game in 7 days. 

You will walk around the world trying to find your daughters in time for the big lift-off. 

Approx game length is between 15 and 25 mins.

The game will be updated in the new year as I'm taking some time off now. 

Updates coming: 

1) Inventory to read the notes collected

2) Option to play the music in-game at any time

3) Trophy/Achievements for in-game

4) Improved voice acting

Enjoy the game and please let me know of any bugs you find and about your experience. 

Feel free to make any videos at all about the game.

Follow me on socials:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DangryGames

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCijlLKAY2ddkDBGqommWOtg
